data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 474,100 people living in Samegrelo-Zemo Svaneti, Georgia. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Samegrelo-Zemo Svaneti, Georgia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Samegrelo-Zemo Svaneti, Georgia to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 73 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Please, teach the 6,429 believers in Samegrelo-Zemo Svaneti, Georgia how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Samegrelo-Zemo Svaneti, Georgia to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Lezgin people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Samegrelo-Zemo Svaneti.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Samegrelo-Zemo Svaneti a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Samegrelo-Zemo Svaneti.
